Uses of Class
oshi.jna.platform.linux.Udev.UdevDevice

Packages that use Udev.UdevDevice 
Package Description
oshi.jna.platform.linux
Provides extensions of JNA libraries for Linux.

  • Uses of Udev.UdevDevice in oshi.jna.platform.linux

    Methods in oshi.jna.platform.linux that return Udev.UdevDevice 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Udev.UdevDevice Udev.UdevContext.deviceNewFromSyspath​(java.lang.String syspath)
    Creates a udev device object based on information found in /sys, annotated with properties from the udev-internal device database.
    Udev.UdevDevice Udev.UdevDevice.getParent()
    Gets the parent of this device
    Udev.UdevDevice Udev.UdevDevice.getParentWithSubsystemDevtype​(java.lang.String subsystem, java.lang.String devtype)
    Gets the parent of this device matching a subsystem and devtype
    Udev.UdevDevice Udev.UdevDevice.ref()
    Acquire a further reference to this object.
    Udev.UdevDevice Udev.udev_device_get_parent​(Udev.UdevDevice udev_device)
    Gets the parent of a udev device
    Udev.UdevDevice Udev.udev_device_get_parent_with_subsystem_devtype​(Udev.UdevDevice udev_device, java.lang.String subsystem, java.lang.String devtype)
    Gets the parent of a udev device matching a subsystem and devtype
    Udev.UdevDevice Udev.udev_device_new_from_syspath​(Udev.UdevContext udev, java.lang.String syspath)
    Allocates a new udev device object and returns a pointer to it.
    Udev.UdevDevice Udev.udev_device_ref​(Udev.UdevDevice udev_device)
    Acquire further references to a udev device object.
    Udev.UdevDevice Udev.udev_device_unref​(Udev.UdevDevice udev_device)
    Drop a reference to a udev device object.
